name: Emoji Merge - Bigger n Bigger
description:
Emoji Merge is a fun casual game for people who want to de-stress, kill time and train their brains.

Features
- Merge gameplay: merge small emojis to bigger and prettier ones! Simple and fun, but also requires a little skill and luck!
- Lovely Emojis: A rich variety of emojis, each with its own unique style.


You can download and play the game for free now! Come on!
